title: Marvel's Disney Plus Shows Have to Change
description:
This video is sponsored by Skillshare. The first 1,000 people to use the link will get a 1 month free trial of Skillshare https://skl.sh/captainmidnight08231
Secret Invasion is the latest in a line of Marvel Disney Plus shows that just don't quite work. In this video, I go over where the MCU shows are failing and how they could improve.
Music by Epidemic Sound (http://www.epidemicsound.com)
